metadata.name: I'm alright
metadata.description:
Dear Friend,

I hope this letter finds you well. I just wanted to reach out and let you know that I'm alright. I know that things have been tough lately, and I appreciate your concern and support. It means a lot to me to have someone like you in my life. I know we've been going through a lot, but I also know that we're working on taking care of ourselves and finding ways to cope. I'm trying to stay positive and focus on the good things in my life, and I wish you do too. I don't want you to worry about me. I'm doing my best to take things one day at a time and find joy in the little things. I'm surrounded by love and support, and that helps me stay strong. I hope this letter brings you some comfort and peace. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything or if you just want to talk. I'm always here for you. 

Take care of yourself, my friend.

Sincerely, Mej.
